items.name: sword
items.description: A standard, well kept, arming sword.

items.name: mace
items.description: A steel mace with wooden handle.

items.name: axe
items.description: A battle axe with a steel spike at the top and a wooden shaft.

items.name: spear
items.description: A spear with 7 ft wooden handle.

items.name: shield
items.description: A wooden shield with boss made of steel and rawhide edges.

items.name: tome
items.description: An old tome. The books text has faded long ago and the paper crumbles to dust when you flip the pages.

items.name: pile of valuables
items.description: A small pile of coins and jewellery.

items.name: kalamakkara
items.description: A thick meaty sausage, pulsating with fishyness. Sliding it up and down your throat could give you godlike powers... or not.

items.name: orb
items.description: A shiny orb, pulsating with magic. Devouring this should make your spirit stronger.
